overview: Peter Worth joined Aria Systems in 2007 as Chief Technology Officer. As CTO, he is responsible for the overarching product and technology strategy for Aria as well as working with key partners to leverage the company’s technology platform. Peter comes to Aria with over 12 years of technology and management experience in Software Development and Management Consulting, the last 5 of which have been spent managing development teams and infrastructures in the SaaS arena. Prior to joining Aria, Peter held management level positions at Taleo, Adjoined Consulting, and Portal Software. He has a Bachelors of Arts degree from Brown University in Economics and a Masters of Science degree in Computer Science from New York University.
